name: Trash RPG
description:
Trash RPG! My very first game ever. And also my very first RPG Maker game. This game is really trashy. 

It is having some funny dialogues, typical battle system and broken classes (sorry about that). 

This game is not meant to insult anyone or any group of people. It is just the humor of the game.

Please also note that only things have been used from the RPG Maker itself. Nothing has been added here. (Except for the title screen)
